alert.note: Alert for Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Loup County through 545 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Rose, or 14 miles east of Brewster, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fox Bayou and Horseshoe Bend Lake. This includes Highway 183 between mile markers 133 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Nebraska.
